DOC.brief_summary: Sevoflurane is widely used for induction of anaesthesia. Several studies showed EEG abnormalities during mask induction with sevoflurane. The aim of our study was to test the induction target concentration of sevoflurane on the spikes wave occurrence.
DOC.brief_title: Interest of the Induction With Target-controlled Inhalation of Sevoflurane on Spikes Wave Occurrence
DOC.criteria: programmed gynecological surgery ASA 1 or 2 arterial hypertension gastrooesophageal reflux pregnancy diabetes obesity asthma tobacco
